snippet: For the first time since 1968, Manchester United’s crosstown rival, Manchester City, is poised to plant its flag atop English soccer by winning its first Premier League title.
abstract: Manchester City is poised to plant its flag atop English soccer by winning its first Premier League title since 1968, besting perennial superpower and crosstown rival Manchester United.
lead_paragraph: For the first time since 1968, Manchester United’s crosstown rival, Manchester City, is poised to plant its flag atop English soccer by winning its first Premier League title.

headline.seo: In Manchester, Supremacy in English Soccer Is Poised to Move Across Town
headline.main: In Manchester, Supremacy in English Game Is Poised to Move Across Town
headline.print_headline: In Manchester, Supremacy in English Game Is Poised to Move Across Town
